CustomField.description: Fill yes, if this project is taking place across multiple countries or regions. Register sub-projects per country in a separate step. If your project takes place only in one country, choose no.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tick the box, if this project is taking place across multiple countries or regions. Register sub-projects per country in a separate step. If your project takes place only in one country, leave the box empty.See Knowledge Base
CustomField.label: Is this an Umbrella Project?
